name: Crime Time
description:
CRIME TIME A top-down time manipulation shooter

You receive an experimental time manipulation device that pauses time for everything that isnt you. Naturally, you decide to rob a bank.

This game was created in 3 days for Mini-Jam #60, the theme was crime, and the limitation was that pausing must be a core mechanic, which is where the idea of pausing everything that isnt you came from.

The heist mechanics are inspired by PAYDAY 2.

Attributions Audio
  • The Drill sound effect - jameswrowles
  • The In-game music - CodeManu (track 2)
Code
  • The A* Pathfinding Project
